about:
I'm a Programmer who has been working in the field for one years. I'm passionate about creating quality products that meet all of the customer's needs, and I love learning new techniques and technologies that allow me to make that happen. 

 Well, I’ve been working on web app development for one year now. Had my own projects, coded mostly in Python and it's framework, 

 My favorites are C, Python and SQL(PostgreSQL, MySQL & Sqlite) because I’m most comfortable with them, but I’m also familiar with Php(Laravel framework), Java and AngularJS and I’m willing to use and improve at any of them.
